name: Broccoli, Cheddar and Ham Strata
recipeIngredient: 16 oz Bag of thawed chopped broccoli
1 Loaf Italian Bread (14 oz.) but into cubes
1/2 lb Sliced low-sodium deli ham, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 375. Coat 2 quart oval baking sheet dish with nonstick spray
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook 5 minutes. Add broccoli and cook another 3 minutes.
Place bread cubes in a large bowl. Stir in onion and broccoli mixture and the ham.
In a medium bowl, whick together eggs, milk, chives, mustard, salt and pepper. Pour over great mixture, stirring to mix. Transfer to prepared dish, and top evenly with cheese.
Bake at 375 for 40-45 minutes, or until strata registers 160 on thermometer.
